name: Untitled Sci-Fi Game
description:
Remember that this is a work in progress, I have only been working on this game for about a month and wanted to get feedback. That said, please feel free to contact me at the sites given below to report bugs and provide feedback and give ideas. All the models are temporary, and nothing is final. I will update this playtest based on feedback and when I have added more features. Thanks for playing.

You can reach me on:

Discord: FlamingWreckGamesOfficial#5290

Email: FlamingWreckGames@gmail.com
